titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Presbyterians Pro-Life Research, Education, and Care, Inc. operates out of Decatur, Georgia. The organization seeks to raise the level of awareness and understanding of the current "Human Life" debate within the Presbyterian Church (U.S.A.).

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of printed materials of Presbyterian Pro-Life. Materials include three issues of the Presbyterians Pro-Life News newsletters from 1984 and four issues of Presbyterians Pro-Life Daily Delivery newsletter from 1988. The collection also includes several pamphlets and flyers.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
